website_summaries.verdict: A set of beautiful, soft silicone straws that add style to any beverage.
pros: Made from BPA-free silicone that can be cut to size
Storage bag and cleaning tool included
Soft, flexible straws have a good mouthfeel
cons: Straws can be difficult to fit in fast-food takeout cups

customer_reviews.title: Tremor Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my mother who has Essential Tremor, which causes a head and hand tremor, much like Parkinson's. She needs a straw to drink but disposable use are not environmentally friendly or readily available. Metal doesn't work, as she can injur herself. These are AMAZING! They are soft and flexible - no jabbing or clanking. They clean easily and fit nicely in her purse, allowing her easy access and maintained dignity!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Seriously wow
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of shocked at how good quality these straws are! They come in a neat little baggie that you can store them in, and the straw cleaner as well! I don't usually leave reviews on products (even if I really like them), but they donate 100% of the proceeds of your order to OCEANA if you leave a review, and that's a HUGE plus for me. So not only do I really like the product, I get to share the good news through this review AND my payment gets donated to OCEANA. I really really appreciate that. 10/10 product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I just received these, was about to use one when I realized that it smelled bad. Really bad. I washed it with dish soap but the smell remains. I took a sip of water and could smell the straw when I brought it up to my lips. I'm pretty disappointed about this, because I don't think that silicone should have such a chemical smell. I don't trust it at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly Straws 😉
customer_reviews.text: They work like straws and clean pretty easily, so I can’t complain! Other than that, they came with what looks like pieces of leaves in with the straws?? I just washed it off, but kinda gross. The bag starts fraying and coming apart pretty soon after purchase, too. Oh and beware, they make you look pretty weird if they’re in a fountain drink cup ‘cause they wobble back and forth..... 🤭😅 But hey, they work and save the environment so it’s all good.
customer_reviews.author: LFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These straws are the perfect diameter for my kids to use. They are a bit on the narrower side- much smaller than the larger smoothie sized straws. They are perfect for iced tea, ice coffee, juice and water drinks. I love that they are reusable- and soft. With regular plastic straws, I always worry that my kids will cut their mouths on the edges. These straws are nice and gentle on the edges. The colors are very nice and bright too- making them fun to drink from. I would recommend these straws to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tatum  Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these for a couple days but I love them! When they arrived they did have a strange scent to them. I just soaked them it hot soapy water and it wasn’t as bad but you could still smell it. But after a few uses it’s not there. The carrying case makes it easy to throw in my bag. Also the straw cleaner is just perfect and feel pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste left in water. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my last review was deleted because the company says I got an authentic product. I have no doubts that my product was authentic; however it did leave a silicone taste in my water which was the reason for my return. That was my original review and I will repost this review again in another 8 months if it’s repeatedly deleted.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first silicone straw purchase and my main concern when buying these was the circumference. I didn't want to feel like I was using a pvc pipe to drink my water. I'm happy to say that these are the same size as a straw from Sonic. Those may be SLIGHTLY larger than the avg straw but not so much that it's bothersome. I placed the Sonic straw and the silicone straw end to end. The silicone straw could be a mm larger, maybe. I haven't used them yet but I'll come back and update my review in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for you!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've been wanting to get re-useable straws for some time now and I saw these and just had to have them! And they are larger around than I anticipated which I am very pleased with! The material made me worry that it could give my drinks an odd after taste but it doesn't add any flavor or scent to it! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Alternative to Plastic Straws
customer_reviews.text: These straws are a good plastic alternative. They are extremely flexible allowing me to stuff the straw in my cup with the lid closed once I finish my drink (no leaks when I toss the empty cup and straw in my back pack.....Yay!). The only negative I have is the straw retains flavors. My tea tasted like the coffee I drank previously. I would suggest dedicated straws for different drink types. Since there are several colors, dedicated straws should not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ski

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I was using one and a piece of silicone came through the straw when I was using it. I cleaned them all after they arrived and didn’t notice any loose pieces. I don’t feel too comfortable using these any more.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate your efforts in keeping our oceans clean of straws.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate your efforts in keeping our oceans clean of straws. I have a disability which prevents me from picking up a cup of glass without spilling some of the contents. The use of a straw allows me to drink. I hope these straws are good for hot drinks as well as cold. The one fault I have found is with the cleaning brush. It does not slide down the straw. It needs to be thinner or softer, or the straw opening larger. Thank you for thinking of our oceans. Sincerely, Joseph Kingston
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect! I love the silicone straws and we've used them daily since we received them. I like that a cleaning brush is included. The colors are fun! We love to use straws in our house but I hated watching all the extra plastic get thrown away. These silicone straws fix that problem. Now my only request is you make shorter straws for our short glasses too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love these straws!!
customer_reviews.text: These straws are awesome. These are the first reusable straws I've purchased and I love them. They're super long, durable, strong, not flimsy at all, and comfortable to use. The little carrying case they come with is super helpful too because it makes it easy to take them anywhere! I love the cute colors they come in. I feel a lot better using these too since I know I'm helping reduce the waste of regular plastic straws. Thank you for the wonderful straws and for supporting ocean life!!
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: big and flexible, but adds a chemical taste to hot liquids
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could like them, because they are perfect size and shape. But the first hot liquid that went through them had a nasty chemical taste. Thought it might be unrinsed dishwasher detergent, so I hand washed the next time. Same thing. Cold liquids don't have the taste, so I'm assuming it's off gassing or something. Sorry, can't be sucking down straw chemicals everyday...
customer_reviews.author: Chawla Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for straw chewers/biters
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I’m always chewing on my straws and I love the flexibility and durability of these. Easy to clean. I have issues with not drinking enough water throughout the day and my husband said he’s noticed a dramatic increase in my water consumption since I purchased these. Noticed I’ve been feeling much better too. I take one with me when we go out to eat too and I’ve noticed I drink a lot more with a straw than without.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opening is a bit too narrow
customer_reviews.text: BEST PART - no trash or recycling needed! I like the silicone, I like the length, and the fact that they fit through the lid openings of Tervis Tumblers. But the opening is a bit narrow, resulting in extra 'sucking effort', thus necessitating pursing of the lips and then, heaven forbid!, probably leading to the kind of wrinkles that smokers get. The brush is hard to get in and could/should be long enough to go to the end, but... I have another that works better Bottom line, I like them well enough to keep, but I'll keep my eyes peeled for something more suitable.
customer_reviews.author: vn dd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to cut down on plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love these straws! I’m trying to reduce the plastic/paper products in our house and this was the solution to plastic straws. At first I wasn’t sure I liked the silicone texture but that only lasted a few minutes. Now I much prefer it to a plastic straw! I trimmed a few at the bottom to better suit the length of our cups. The only thing I’d like to change is the cleaning tool. If it were the length of the straw, I think it’d be a little easier to clean but you can clean it from both ends just fine. If you’re wanting reusable straws, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan B

customer_reviews.title: Durable, washable, soft bite. Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very soft straws, easy on the teeth. My kids like to chew on straws and the material doesn't wear or mark from that. It comes with a brush to clean them. We are able to drink thick, real fruit smoothies from them even though they have a smaller inside diameter. Less "chugging" power. They come with a package to keep them seperate which I will like when traveling with them camping, etc. And for every review, the company donates 100% of the proceeds of the purchase to OCEANA. Thank you Flathead! Cool straws. Update: still holding up well! Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: DOCO

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straws, but smaller than a regular straw
customer_reviews.text: I love these silicone straws. They fit nicely in a drink and hold themselves up as well as a regular straw. They are also foldable, which makes them easier to haul around! I just wish I had bought the smoothie size! The diameter of these straws is slightly smaller than a standard straw. I've noticed that with some reusable straws, and I'd rather have a "larger than regular" straw than a smaller one. If that's you, I definitely recommend getting the bigger size. But overall, they are great! I definitely prefer them over the metal one I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Tiniferous

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: Straws work great. It would have been helpful if the cleaning brush had come with them though!! Item description says it is included. I did not get one.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't I gotten them sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things!! I've had them for about three months now and they really hold up well. The silicone isn't too hard, and they fold up and fit in my purse super easily. I really like that they came with their own tool to wash and scrub out the inside of them, super useful! They are slightly bent at the top (as you can tell from the photos), so when I put them in my camelbak or nalgene, I have to be mindful not to lose it in the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Ania D

customer_reviews.title: I love these straws!
customer_reviews.text: First, I purchased 2 sizes. One size fits the 20 ounce Yeti and the other size is for the 30 ounce Yeti. The larger size is tall enough to use in a 20 ounce soda bottle. These silicone straws are strong and durable. Anyone who has sensitive teeth and who doesn't like cold metal to touch their lips can appreciate these reusable straws. Secondly, I personally don't care for metal straws. I bought silicone tips for the metal straws and found that it can be a challenge to slide them on and to remove them, plus they are easy to lose. Lastly, the hard plastic straws break easily. This order included a cleaning brush, which is much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: This review is from someone who enjoyed reading this book and can't  wait to start on the next book

customer_reviews.title: Great size Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous if they would clean well in the dishwasher but they do great! After smoothies we just rinse them out after use and they clean great; no stains. Haven’t tried coffee or tea yet we just use our glass straws for that. These are also smaller in diameter than the glass straws about the same as stainless steel but I can’t stand stainless steel because I feel like I’m taste the stainless in my drink
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopper

customer_reviews.title: No regrets on this purchase!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used these yet, they just came, but hey there straws, I assume they’ll function like straws. They are a great size for the width just as wide as your typical plastic straw, they are cute versatile colors they feel sturdy, they come with a nice sturdy pipe cleaner, and a case to put them in. All in all I think these are fantastic, I’m excited to finally rid my life of plastic straws. We will be keeping a couple in the car in the case at all times so that we can refuse plastic straws when we get our drinks when we are out and about. These are totally worth the great price.
customer_reviews.author: chris elliott

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I like the straws, HOWEVER while using two of them so far I have sucked up small pieces of the silicone. It was very disturbing and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Liking them
customer_reviews.text: I drink smoothies daily and just gotta have a straw. Paper straws are icky, and still disposable. Wasn't into the idea of metal straws (feel like I could hurt myself on them...clumsy). These are a good alternative. They're kind of... flaccid. Drinking from it for the first time was a little weird given the soft feel, but I quickly got used to it and now I don't even notice. I got the "extra long" ones and to me they seem like normal straw length. Great that they come with their own pipe cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: bettylion

customer_reviews.title: Great way to be environmentally friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great! They are a nice flexible material. They also aren’t conductors of heat and they don’t get freezing cold when they are in a cold drink. The cleaner is great and easy to use. I bought them for my family to use instead of plastic straws and they are fantastic! I would definitely tell anyone who wants to make their house a non plastic household to purchase these! I also love that they donate proceeds to a charity supporting clean oceans!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sanders-Eachus

customer_reviews.title: The best so far.
customer_reviews.text: These straws are the best I’ve bought so far! I’ve previously bought and used reusable metal and plastic straws. I hated the way the metal felt and left a metal taste in my mouth. The plastic ones are too stiff. So I thought I’d try these and they are wonderful! They’re good durable quality, yet still flexible. They are a little thicker than normal straws, but not by much. I like that they can bend and flex and leave absolutely no bad taste in my mouth. If you’re wanting to try silicone straws, try these!
customer_reviews.author: MissB0113

customer_reviews.title: Help the environment with these reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get reusable straws and these were a great pick! The main reason for getting these straws was to help eliminate my single-use plastic intake and the silicon material allows me to still bite/chew on the straw whereas the metal or hard plastic doesn't allow me to do that. Something that can be improved is the cleaning tool, the mental likes to bends when you are cleaning inside the straws. You get 10 silicon straws for a great price and they come with a cute bag to carry them so you can use them at restaurants. I would highly recommend this product for someone looking for reusable straws!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Only came with 4
customer_reviews.text: Great straws and they work great, but I only received 4 when there was suppose to be 10 of them. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: William Lui

customer_reviews.title: From not a VSCO girl: honest to god perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used other reusable straws in the past, & they never held up, were HUGE, or just smelled weird (I’m assuming the plastic? Idk, not a scientist, just tryna save the ocean & still drink water with a normal taste). But these were perfect. They’ve held up fantastically. They’re not slick, not too rough: a perfect texture. Slender, but still get a good gulp. PLUS I got the pack that had subdued colors, & I didn’t feel like I was drinking out of a radioactive lime green tube. Like, yes I’m environmentally conscious, but not at the risk of a HOT PINK HORROR that everyone in the room sees the minute you walk in. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I like that I can cut some of them for different types of drinks and cups because so many come in a pack. I even got another set as a gift and had to regift them haha. They’re on the thinner side which is what I prefer and I like the bent shape. I use three throughout the week and when one gets gross from a smoothie or something I’ll put it in the dish washer and it comes out perfect! Can’t say enough great things highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than most other brands
customer_reviews.text: I was quite impressed with these straws. For one, they're a bit thicker than other brands. We've been using silicone straws for a while, and my kids like to eventually chew a hole in them, so I cut them shorter and shorter. I love that these are extra long and the fact that they're a lithe thicker might just make them hold up to my kids better! Also, my package was missing some straws. I sent a message to the company and they very quickly answered. Resolved to my liking so I can't complain! Awesome product and company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy 2 two

customer_reviews.title: Great would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great straws. I put some in my car so I have them on the go. I have put them in the dishwasher multiple times no problems so far. The light colored ones doesn’t stain after sitting in cranberry juice. They’re too thin to drink smoothies out of but this brand sells a fatter version. They are super bendy and don’t stay compressed or become damaged when I chew on them. I do wish it came with a case to put one in so it’s more travel friendly but I just keep them in a ziploc in my glove box.
customer_reviews.author: OGJellyfish

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are made really well. I bought these because I can’t stand metal straws. These straws are pretty thick but they work great. They’re flimsy, so I can’t stir my drink but at least I don’t have that yucky metal taste (from stainless steel straws) anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I love many things about these straws. I love that I'm not wasting plastic constantly. I love that they are curved at the top so that I don't spill my drink everywhere which I'm prone to do. I love the colors, they aren't too flashy, but they are very nice. I love that they come in a bag so that I can take them with me and have them stay sanitary. I love that they bend and aren't overly structured and stiff. This is worth the money. They will last awhile. Don't put these friends in the dishwasher, though.
customer_reviews.author: JLYNN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, wash great in dishwasher. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these straws! We use them for smoothies almost every morning. They are so easy to clean. We just rinse them out or use the cleaner stick it came with, and then stick them in the dishwasher! They wash great in the dishwasher! And don’t collect any hard water or soap deposits on them. I cut a couple of them to be shorter to fit my toddlers cups better. She knows which colors are hers. It’s perfect! We’ve had them for a few months now and use them all the time. My toddler even chews on them. And they are holding up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Reduce your plastic use!
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to reduce my plastic use and these straws help me do it. I have one with me at all times and they’ve been great. I cut a couple down to use is shorter glasses. So easy to clean with the cleaning brush that comes with them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Works, but Detergent Buildup
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these and I do until the first wash when inevitably, they taste just like the detergent they were washed with in the dishwasher. That's nasty. I have tried cleaning them so many different ways - soaking in dawn soap, vinegar, lemon juice, lemon essential oil, lots of scrubbing with each method using a straw brush - and nothing will get the detergent residue/taste off.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice reusable straws that aren't noisy like metal ones
customer_reviews.text: We use reusable straws a lot at home. The stainless steel ones are loud and clanky when you use them with glass or metal tumblers. So I got these silicone ones and they are perfectly fine. I like that I don't get that "I'm going to accidentally jab myself in the eye" sensation I sometimes get with the steel straws... but that's probably not an issue for most people.
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful silicone straws
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and colorful. They can bend and be placed in the little bag provided and will be clean for traveling. You can even fit in your pocket. I got them for my baby and I love that I can cup them to accommodate different size cups. The brush that comes with them is great for cleaning. Will suggest that they wrap in brown recycled paper instead of plastic. Most of all, happy that they will donate money to Oceana for this review. Let’s keep our planet clean!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Skinny
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. Very skinny and hard to drink out of
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: BEST straws for large YETI & other tumblers
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous reusable straws for my Yeti Tumblers, none of which have worked- UNTIL NOW! These straws are long enough to fit perfectly in the 30oz Yeti, and still be comfortable enough to drink out of. They are easy to clean, and fit in many different lid tops. I have not noticed a smell or taste like some have said in their reviews, but I did soak them in soapy very hot water, and then scrubbed each with the included brush before using. VERY happy with these straws! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Only wish it came with an additional bag :)
customer_reviews.text: These straws are perfect for our needs. Our family drinks a lot of water + ice. We have tumblers with hard plastic straws but of course for whatever reason, those bend and break as they are so rigid. These are great for tumblers and it would be really good if it came with an extra bag so I could leave a few of the straws in our car. We haven't used the straws for anything overly sticky/sweet - so a good rinse in warm soapy water has worked fine. Great purchase + we are doing our part for the environment & SAVING THE TURTLES!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic taste/smell
customer_reviews.text: Great straws, I loved the colors and the durability but I could not get past the taste/smell of them. I use them in my water cups and all I can taste is plastic even after thoroughly washing . :( disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to cut down on my single-use products and I love straws. I refuse to drink from a cup without one. I have metal ones but I like to chew on my straws, so silicone is where it's at.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hornbacher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean
customer_reviews.text: Overall these have been great. I love the carrying case. I’ve had a few experiences where the only straws available were paper. While it’s better for the environment, my kids and I hate drinking from a straw that deteriorates into our drinks and sticks to our lips. So I got these. They come with the cleaning brush so they couldn’t be easier to use. Also a nice replacement to the metal straws and no busting your teeth on them.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I got them to replace the tall, thin, metal one I’ve been using with my 32oz yeti tumbler. I’ve never liked metal straws and these fit perfectly. They’re easy to clean with the straw brush and we use the little grass drying rack most people use to dry baby paraphernalia to dry our straws because we can stick them on a “blade of grass” and stand them upright so they dry properly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and supports a great cause
customer_reviews.text: Just like many other reviews, I’m here to ensure my purchase proceeds the OCEANA organization. But these straws are of very high quality. There was no noticeable chemical smell that comes with a lot of these reusable products. The cleaning brush works just fine with the straws, I would say the metal handle could be a little more sturdy due to a snug fit and the bend in the straw neck. They are very flexible, so if you are someone who needs a full glass of ice for their beverage, you’ll probably experience some issues in stirring. Otherwise, I feel with just a few cubes they can manage to stir drinks just fine. Will definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MinnieB

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner provided doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the straws, variety of colors, and they fit in my Yeti lid. But the little straw cleaner they sent won't go past 1/2" into the straw. Wet, dry, with soap, doesn't matter. Now I am not sure how to get anything other than water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: p928gts1

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straw!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work great so far. I was not a big fan of reusable straws but I know some places like beaches will not allow plastic straws. I have 2 special need children and I needed some for them to use at the beach. They are funny about change but these seem to work fine for them. I like the silicone ones much better than the metal ones for sure!
customer_reviews.author: W. hall

customer_reviews.title: BEST STRAWS EVER
customer_reviews.text: Will most likely be replacing all of my reusable straws for these. Love the colors, not too bright but still cute, the material is awesome. I never smack my teeth with it, unlike the stainless steel ones. And they are dishwasher safe which makes for the easiest cleaning. They do come with their own cleaning brush as well. I recommend these to all my friends and family who are on the reusable straw wagon. Thank you for these!
customer_reviews.author: NaeNae

customer_reviews.title: Great straws!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic especially for the price. The are comfortable when drinking. Do not hurt your mouth from cold metal when drinking cold drinks, are very durable and easy to clean, and are fun! They are perfect size for medium to tall cups, but my kids also use them for small cups and they are light so they work great. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Best Straws Overall but Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not a deal breaker, but the two halves of the straw aren’t put together very smoothly, so feeling that ridge while your drinking is kind of annoying. Also, if you like to use straws to stir your drinks, it’s not easy to do so with this straw. When I tried to stir my drink, the straw kinda reminded me of Harry Potter’s arm in Chamber of Secrets when Prof. Lockhart tried to mend his bones. lol Despite my review, I do love these straws more than the others I’ve been using.
customer_reviews.author: KristalOfPeace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drinking liquids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the purpose of moving liquids from a canister into my body, and it worked just as expected. No user manual was provided, though I don't believe it was needed. A bag and cleaning stick was included, but let's be real... does anyone actually use the bag and cleaning stick? I'd purchase again for all of my liquid moving needs.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Crew

customer_reviews.title: Soft Rubber But They Are Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are soft rubber, but are still sturdy. They stand up nicely (like don't bend over at all), and are really easy to clean. They come with a cute little carrying case and the colors are super classy and neutral (which is one of the main reasons they drew me in). I'm excited to drink out of my cups now, and I'm not creating plastic waste while doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sease

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy! Multi colored for everyone! Greatest straws for kids and my favorite too!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love these straws! Great for my kiddo that’s teething and special needs kiddo also! (Oral stimulation) If you’re a special needs parent then you know the challenge and see how this can help :-D It comes with a straw cleaner and travel bag so it really works on the go! These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 5

customer_reviews.title: Eliminating single-use plastic! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to eliminate my single-use plastic and waste. Decided to go with silicone vs stainless steel because I have a toddler at home. I like that the silicone is food-grade and I can cut the length to my desire. They clean well and have no smell. Comes with a cute carry case. The colors are very pretty too. Overall, love this! Good for me, good for the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good straws, the silicone makes them a bit floppy but not too annoying. Came with a nice assortment of colors and didn’t notice any odor or taste. I washed in some dish soap and vinegar upon arrival before use. The pipe cleaner helps and the fact that it’s silicone makes it easy to get inside with it and clean. Should last a while
customer_reviews.author: jae h.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the metal straws and they’re great but I always bump my gums and teeth. I didn’t want to take the chance in any of them breaking or bleeding badly so I looked up silicon straws. I love these colors. Comes in a carry bag so they’re all clean in my purse at the moment. And they do. It hurt my mouth in any way! Nice feel in your mouth too. Not to be weird. But that’s important. We’re so used to study straws, and the paper ones don’t add up for me. I just keep thinking, “chug your drink or it will melt!” So I’m glad I finally bought some new straws.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect straws
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try silicone straws after using glass and metal straws. They’re sturdy enough and also soft- so kid friendly. I was afraid to give my daughter the metal or the glass straws for her safety. These seem greats. Had them for a couple weeks not and no complaints. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! The colors are exactly as shown and product is of great quality. I didn’t think they would work in my smaller tumblers with sip lids, but they fit! A little snug but you just pull up a little and you are able to enjoy your drink with no problem. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Crodrig28

customer_reviews.title: There might be A piece of plastic you suck up with your drink .
customer_reviews.text: I rinsed out each of these straws before using them in drinks. Unfortunately for my son, he still sucked up some of the piece of plastic straw that was not supposed to have remained inside the straw. Luckily he was next to a trash can when he spit the milkshake out into his hand to see what the rubber was in his drink. It was really disgusting and now no one in my family will use the straws.
customer_reviews.author: By JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the feeling of metal straws but was nervous about keeping silicone ones clean! Haven’t had any issues thus far just make sure to rinse and use the cleaning brush! The colors are so cute and they are very thick so if you mindlessly chew on your straws they’ll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdiness...I mean, they seem like they’ll hold up for a life time, but they are wiggly and flexible. Super pleased with this purchase. The colors are beautiful, they are resilient to anxious chewing, and they are cutting out my terrible straw usage. It came with a little carrying bag, and a tool to clean it. I’m happy with ‘em.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hart

customer_reviews.title: Best Straws Ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I have had different reusable straws before, the aluminum kind, the bamboo kind, and even other silicone kind. I can honestly say that these are the best. They have just the right firmness to feel like a strong straw and also the flexibility to really fit them in a bag or purse to take them with me. Super easy to clean and I love the colors! There is zero plastic taste, which was the problem with the ones I've previously had. Overall definitely one of the best purchases I've made and now I can trust I will never have to buy a straw again!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Olmedo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable silicone straws!
customer_reviews.text: These straws were just what I was looking for. I have a 21oz HydroFlask and these straws are the perfect height and have the flexibility to be pushed into the bottle to put the cap on. I have had these straws for about a year now and they are still as sturdy as the day I bought them. I just recently got a 24oz HydroFlask and the straws come up just to the rim on the bottle, I wish they made more straws just a little longer, I absolutely love them and everyone asks about them! They come in multiple colors to always switch it up as well as a cleaning brush. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Eco  and disability  friendly
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandmother who was having a hard time sitting up and drinking j bed and wanted to find something more sustainable than plastic, single-use straws At first she was a little skeptical about the texture, but after a few days she fell in love . They are easy to clean and store, so she has them readily available when needed. It has cut down on our costs and eco footprint! The straws come with a bag to store and a brush to clean them out. We have also had success running them through the dishwasher after she used them for water.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Oakes

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I can't stand the way metal straws feel on my teeth. These are awesome because you get more than you will need in your house, so I have some in my car, and my purse, to ensure that I won't be without them. The carrying case they come with is good quality, and the scrub brush works great. The colors are also really nice! I don't really know what else to say about a straw lol, but if you are wanting some good quality reusable straws, easy to clean, and easy to travel with, these are a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it. I have a habit of biting the straw and these guys go right back to their original form. I initially didn’t pay attention when I bought them lol they’re better then the metal ones which are usually cold if you have it in a cold drink. I have sensitive teeth so this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mthao90

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Destroys a wonderful to have in the house they’re great for reusability and to have on hand instead of regular throwaway drinking straws there a wonderful addition to the house for having a reusable echo green type of straw and they come with a cleaning implement Ifly use them with the reusable cups which goes together nicely
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Good and safe
customer_reviews.text: Great straws. I use these for drinking hot coffee but ended up using them for everything. They are also good for my kids. They are bendable so if my two year old was holding it, walking around like the wiggly guy he is, and fell, it wouldn’t poke him or hurt him.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot coffee to prevent staining your teeth
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and perfect for my morning hot coffee. I did not want to continue to stain my teeth from coffee and tea so I bought these for my mugs and they are wonderful. I did not want metal because it hurts if you accidentally hit your teeth against the straw and it’s too hot with coffee. This is perfectly flexible and does well with hot coffee.
customer_reviews.author: jkauser

customer_reviews.title: Typical straw size
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. The other set of silicone straws I have has lasted for over 3 years, no issues. However, they are smoothie size and I wanted “normal” size. These are perfect. They also came with a cleaning brush that is long enough for the whole straw.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: FLATHEAD STRAWS
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order of straws and dove in tried one in my coffee drink. The straw is great. It holds up to hot liquids and is easy to clean. I really like the colors too. Thank you for donating to the ocean conservation project. I am a big fan of all things whale related and appreciate your efforts. Thank you for the excellent product and your help to our environment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Easy to Clean Straws
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased reusable straws before & was reluctant to do so again; however, Flathead has one amazing product. I love the fact they are dishwasher safe. This makes cleaning so much easier. If you don't have a dishwasher, a brush is provided for you & works well too. I have run a few of them through the dishwasher & have not seen any issues. I would have given 5 stars for durability but since they haven't been used or washed often enough I gave 4. Though I do feel they will last much longer than those I purchased before. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was hesitant on buying but thought I would take a chance. I absolutely love these as I use them for my coffee mug for work. I immediately put them in the dishwasher and there's no after taste, no smell, easy to clean and very durable..
customer_reviews.author: chasity hord

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect with minor changes
customer_reviews.text: These are great straws, and I will be purchasing the same brand in the larger straws. That being said, there are a few things that would make these better. The cleaning tool that comes with them is very difficult to grasp once it’s in the straw. I wish it was long enough to go all the way through, also. The other thing I would change is there is a seam in the silicone that runs on the bottom of the straw, which is what your tongue touches. I would rather have the seam on the side. Not a huge deal but could be a better design. Thanks for donating to charity!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Easy use, clean, and no taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dual purpose - restaurants when I start going to them again, and for work so I can more easily drink without taking off my mask. They work out great! The extra length gives me the flexibility to cut to fit whatever I need them for and maneuver them under my mask to drink. There is no flavor/taste at all, and they are very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: PTX2

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great straws! They fit perfectly in my 32-oz Tervis. They are flexible but hold their shape well. The feeling is definitely different from a regular plastic straw, but it doesn't really take a lot of getting used to as it is more comfortable. They are definitely more comfortable than metal or bamboo or even hard plastic straws. The slight bend is perfect. I didn't have any issues with weird smell or taste that silicone sometimes has. I cleaned all of them (and the bag) prior to use and the cleaning brush seems to work well. The carrying bag feels like a nice material-it is breathable and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JPlovesGiraffes

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! Better than any other reusable straw out there
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these straws. I so badly needed to switch to reusable straws for the sake of the environment and was looking at a few different ones. I decided upon these and I’m so happy I did. No bad taste, easy to clean, standard straw size (and you can easily cut it if you want!), and such pretty colors! I love sticking them in my grande iced Starbucks drinks! I’ve gotten a ton of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Varsha

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to bendy straws and it helps preserve the oceans!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using metal straws for about a year now and I love them but then I heard about these straws and reviews have mentioned they're good for people who like to chew on their straws AND that the proceeds are donated to a non-profit that help preserve oceans so I knew I had to get them. They come in really pretty colors and they come with a bag and a cleaning brush which is really convenient for on the go. They're great for all kinds of drinks (plain water to thick smoothies) and they help the environment. Plus they're at a really affordable price point so I will definitely be getting them in the future! Highly recommend these straws!
customer_reviews.author: Pratiksha Patel

customer_reviews.title: Never Been so Excited Over Straws 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these straws from Flathead! The colors are estheically pleasing, they are so velvety soft yet durable, easy to clean (comes with cleaner) and just such a good purchase to help reduce plastic straws in our home or on the go! My favorite thing about these are since they are so soft, my 9 month old son won’t hurt himself when he decides to rip my straw from my cup. It won’t hurt his mouth like previous hard plastic/steel ones have. An essential if you have babes! 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable option for at home and when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these straws for about 2 months and use them daily. I prefer the silicone material to metal or glass because it won't break, can be used in hot drinks, and is flexible. When I take smoothies with me in mason jars, I also carry a clean straw in the provided bag, and then after I use it and get it covered in smoothie residue I can just fold the straw inside the jar for cleaning when I get back home. Also the colors are very cute, especially the pink one! I'm writing this review because Flathead said they would donate the proceeds of each sale to Oceana for every review written!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Slides out of my mouth
customer_reviews.text: This if probably a personal problem but these straws are hard for me to keep from slipping out of my mouth cause they're fatter than most straws and they're slippery cause they're silicone. Maybe cause I have smaller lips... IDK. It's just kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Moonangel

customer_reviews.title: Great Price/Better Colors
customer_reviews.text: It's been a month or two now Got these straws for coffee and cold drinks so they don't touch my teeth (sensitive) So far they are holding up to daily use. Comes with a pipe cleaner for easy cleaning. Good selection of colors and seems to be pretty durable rubber/plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Straws!
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely a great choice, I love that they are soft and pliable. I prefer to super cold ice water and drink through straws, which hurts my teeth, so its great that I can tuck it inside my water bottle and it snaps back into shape just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marriah

customer_reviews.title: Great straws!
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws so much that I give them as gifts. No chemical flavor, easily portable, soft and bendable but spring right back into shape...they are perfect. I usually hand wash them (they include a brush) because I'm not sure the dishwasher can fully clean the inside of the straw, but I also throw them in the dishwasher from time to time for extra sanitizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The brush is great. I have also put the lipstick stained ones in the dishwasher and they do great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I love the thicker texture. Easy to clean. They’re perfect. One motivation I had in buying these is that my two year old likes to walk around drinking from straws and I was afraid she would fall and the straw would hurt her eye. These wouldn’t hurt her even if she fell. I love them and love that they’re better for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a straw to fit in my water bottle that has a slightly smaller opening than my Yeti. This straw works great! I love the colors and the material and the price is great for how many you get. I'm really trying to be better about never using a disposable straw and having these help. I also make smoothies in the morning and have no issues using this size with a thick smoothie. Also, I stick them in the dishwasher and they hold up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just received them yesterday. They were easy to clean and are a good size to drink with. They fit very well in my insulated cup lids. I can’t rate the durability yet. I like the different colors so each person gets their own two straws.
customer_reviews.author: jsirhan

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed.
customer_reviews.text: These are so great and feel much more normal than a metal straw. I don't chew my straws but something about a metal straw clanking against your teeth when you go to sip, just doesn't do it for me. I also like the bend in these as I typically used those kinds of straws (from ikea). Fairly easy to clean so far
customer_reviews.author: T. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A good straw alternative to plastic
customer_reviews.text: Nice straws. The colors are really pretty. Where they are seamed together seems a little weak and I’m worried they might split and break there. However they seem to be okay so far. I like that they are long and can fit in my tall tumblers and you can cut them down shorter if you don’t need them y’all.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Harris

customer_reviews.title: Can you love a straw?
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd be writing a review...on straws...but these are great! I use them for my morning homemade Frappuchinos and find they are easier to clean than some other brands I have used in the past. They do not stain (I was worried about the white straw and brown coffee stains, but no issues after using for a few months). You won't regret these.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinahat

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these straws!!! I like the colors, they are easy to clean, and they are easy on the teeth. I don’t really know what I expected when I ordered these straws, for some reason I didn’t expect them to be soft and flexible, but I’m glad I bough them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These have become a staple in my home for smoothies and to fit through the lid of my yeti tumblers. Love the colors and the multi pack allows for cutting a few to fit smaller cups. Includes a brush, but I find they clean easily just rinsed we’ll and I also throw in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great straws. No odor.children.
customer_reviews.text: Cute with no odor and no taste. I got these to replace some reusable plastic straws that left a weird taste in my drinks. These don’t. They are a little harder to drink from as the require more force to suck liquids through, but nothing that would be a problem. In fact, if you have older sick relatives or children than choke easily from straws that are too fast, these would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: I mean what can you say without being super tree hugger lol they are great in the fact that they help the environment and easy to clean. Plus to all parents thinking about this they are great to have if your little ones are chewing on there sippy cup straws.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

product_meta.title: Flathead Set of 10 Reusable Silicone Drinking Straws - Extra long for 30oz and 20oz tumblers - Comes with cleaning brush
feature_bullets: ✔️ HIGH QUALITY SILICONE - We only use 100% food grade, BPA free silicone. Our environmentally friendly straws are easy on your teeth without the worry that comes with other materials AND they are kid friendly
✔️ REGULAR SIZE - These are your quintessential reusable straws for everyday use consuming your favorite beverages
✔️ COMPATIBLE WITH TUMBLERS - Use with your favorite RTIC, tervis, or YETI 20 oz or 30 oz tumblers for either cold or hot drinks

✔️ CLEANS EASILY - Our silicone straws are dishwasher safe. We always recommend to wash your new Flathead straws before the first use in warm soapy water with the included cleaning brush or a give them a spin through the dishwasher

✔️ INCLUDES 10 STRAWS + 1 CLEANING BRUSH + 1 CARRYING BAG - A beautiful color palate originally created by Flathead Products of blue, teal, purple, pink, and white reusable straws. Use the convenient carrying bag to protect and keep your straws clean during your travels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,867 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
